successes.title: Snap Judgment Season 6: Support EPIC Storytelling
successes.description: Bring incredible stories to life "Snap Style." Support the award-winning radio show that dares listeners to see the world in a new way.

Pledges.description: The Snap LIVE Ringtone!  Get happy over and over and over and over and over again.  It's the jam that lets you know whoever's on the line has a story to tell.

Tote The Tote.  Be the envy of your farmer's market with the Snap Judgment Tote Bag.  Those heirloom tomatoes and English cucumbers never had it so good!  Yeah, you can have the ringtone, to call attention to your new tote.
You've seen them on the internets.  Now hang your favorite Snap Poster right above the mantle!  In living color, baby.

Best of Snap LIVE! Video download. Be one of the first to see, hear, and experience our most popular Snap Judgment LIVE performances, all on one special edition video download. Including the incomparable Noah St. John, Joyce Lee, James Judd, and more!
Rock the Runway with the Snap Judgment T-Shirt! (Specially Designed by Award-winning Artist, Sirron Norris.)  We even throw in TWO Snap stickers, so you can go Snap Slap Happy.

Scary but TRUE... Spooky Story Competition + Snap Judgment T-Shirt & Video Download: 
Send us your scariest TRUE story! Finalists will be chosen by our expert Producer team and the scariest 3 stories will be put up on our Facebook page to be voted on. The scariest story will be read by Glynn on our annual "Spooked" Podcast in October! Stories are due Oct. 17, Top Three announced the following week, and the winner declared by 10/24. Even if you don't want to participate, everyone will get a sweet Snap Judgment T-shirt and a video of "The Best of Snap Judgment LIVE"!
Sport the Snap "It's Cold Outside" Hoodie, Playa!  Look good while warding off that wind chill. Also get three Snap Stickers to slap anywhere (on anybody) you wish.

Personalized Bedtime Story Created by the Snap Judgment team, with YOUR name (or any name you want) in it! We'll record an original story backed by an original Snap Judgment beat. There'll be nothing else like it in the world! We'll also give you the Snap Judgment Ringtone and Video Download of the Best of Snap Judgment LIVE Performances. We'll contact you as we get close to recording time to get the name.

Grab the Snap Pac Goodie Bag (now you're outfitted!)  Show off the Snap Hoodie, the Snap T-shirt, three Snap posters, five Snap stickers, and the Snap Tote!!  Wear / carry everything at the same time for added Snap status.

Date Night Extraordinaire! Get crazy points with your honey when they discover you've got two VIP Snap LIVE tix with backstage passes!  Join Team Snap in the middle of last minute frenzy.  Glynn might even cuss you out!
See the show, then get your drink on at a special invite-only afterparty with the best storytellers in the world.
We're rocking a show in San Francisco, October 25th & 26th, 2015, but your tix are good for wherever we happen to land for the next year.

Personalized Bedtime Story + Snap Judgment T-shirt + Ringtone + Video Download of the Best of Snap Judgment LIVE Performances
Includes everything in the $200 "Bedtime Story" Reward, and we'll give you a T-shirt as well!

2 VIP Tickets + Backstage Passes + Afterparty + 2 T-Shirts + 2 Stickers = One Stellar Date Night! Includes everything in the "Date Night" Pack plus Two T-Shirts and stickers to bring home! Join Team Snap in the middle of last minute frenzy. See the show, then get your drink on at a special invite-only afterparty with the best storytellers in the world. We're rocking a show in San Francisco, October 25th & 26th, 2014, but your tix are good for wherever we happen to land for the next year.
Your Name In Lights!  Hear your name "

" read into the credits of a national Snap Judgment broadcast (right after "the Uber-Producer" and before "Will Urbina.")
 
Fame and fortune will certainly follow, as attractive people seek your company to discover your secret.
